long_desc: The wise King Welmar sits here in his throne.
flags_raw: In his later middle-age, with his beard starting to grey, King Welmar
stats1_raw: is still very powerfully built, and wouldn't take kindly to an attack.
stats2_raw: Despite that, you know he is well-loved throughout the land, and has
stats3_raw: a reputation as a wise and just ruler.
